title: BurnAware Professional 8.9 Multilingual (Install + Portable)
description:
BurnAware Professional 8.9 Multilingual (Install + Portable)

Release date: 26/02/2016

About the portable version: unzip and merge reg file BurnAware.reg to register, you're good to go.

BurnAware is a family of full-featured and free burning software to create CD, DVD and Blu-ray discs of all types. Home users can easily burn bootable discs, multisession discs, high-quality audio CDs and video DVDs, make, copy and burn disc images. Power users will benefit from BurnAware's advanced options, including control of boot settings, UDF partition and versions, ISO levels and restrictions, session selection, CD text for tracks and discs, data recovering, disc spanning and direct copying.

All Media Storage

Support of a wide range of optical disc data storage, including CD, DVD, Blu-ray discs, Double Layer discs, rewritable and extra large capacity DVD and Blu-ray media.

Various Tasks

BurnAware covers all daily burning tasks such as disc burning, backup, verification, image creation, copying, erasing, data recovery, audio track extraction.

Version 8.9 - Released 26-Feb-2016

New Features
â€¢ An option to automatically shutdown PC when done.
â€¢ No advertisement (opencandy) during installation of Free version.
â€¢ Stop / play track by double click in Audio CD compilation.

Enhancements
â€¢ Custom Disc has been renamed to Data Disc (ISO / UDF).
â€¢ Updated installer and translations.
â€¢ Command-line improvements.
â€¢ Improvements to algorithm of write speed detection.
â€¢ Improvements to session import process (multisession disc).

Bug Fixes
â€¢ Bug with playing audio tracks in Audio CD compilation.
â€¢ Minor bug fixes.

Homepage http://www.burnaware.com/
